term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - reduced mobile phase velocity, v, in chromatography
term.title: reduced mobile phase velocity

item.text: A term used mainly in liquid chromatography. It compares the mobile phase velocity with the velocity of diffusion into the pores of the particles (the so-called diffusion velocity, u D): In open-tubular chromatography:

item.alttext: v = u ̄ u D = u ̄ d p D M
v = u ̄ d c D M

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 840 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
